Rules.Name: QUANTITY-1-G
Rules.Description: The quantity of green should be exactly 1.

Rules.Name: QUANTITY-1-O
Rules.Description: The quantity of orange should be exactly 1.

Rules.Name: QUANTITY-1-K
Rules.Description: The quantity of black should be exactly 1.

Rules.Name: QUANTITY-1-W
Rules.Description: The quantity of white should be exactly 1.

Rules.Name: QUANTITY-1-B
Rules.Description: The quantity of blue should be exactly 1.

Rules.Name: QUANTITY-2-G
Rules.Description: The quantity of green should be exactly 2.

Rules.Name: QUANTITY-2-O
Rules.Description: The quantity of orange should be exactly 2.

Rules.Name: QUANTITY-2-K
Rules.Description: The quantity of black should be exactly 2.

Rules.Name: QUANTITY-2-W
Rules.Description: The quantity of white should be exactly 2.

Rules.Name: QUANTITY-2-B
Rules.Description: The quantity of blue should be exactly 2.

Rules.Name: TOP-G
Rules.Description: No other colors may be below green.

Rules.Name: TOP-O
Rules.Description: No other colors may be below orange.

Rules.Name: TOP-K
Rules.Description: No other colors may be below black.

Rules.Name: TOP-W
Rules.Description: No other colors may be below white.

Rules.Name: TOP-B
Rules.Description: No other colors may be below blue.

Rules.Name: NOTTOP-G
Rules.Description: No other colors may be above green.

Rules.Name: NOTTOP-O
Rules.Description: No other colors may be above orange.

Rules.Name: NOTTOP-K
Rules.Description: No other colors may be above black.

Rules.Name: NOTTOP-W
Rules.Description: No other colors may be above white.

Rules.Name: NOTTOP-B
Rules.Description: No other colors may be above blue.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-G-G
Rules.Description: Every green must touch another green.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-O-O
Rules.Description: Every orange must touch another orange.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-K-K
Rules.Description: Every black must touch another black.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-W-W
Rules.Description: Every white must touch another white.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-B-B
Rules.Description: Every blue must touch another blue.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-G-G
Rules.Description: Every green must not touch another green.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-O-O
Rules.Description: Every orange must not touch another orange.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-K-K
Rules.Description: Every black must not touch another black.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-W-W
Rules.Description: Every white must not touch another white.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-B-B
Rules.Description: Every blue must not touch another blue.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-G-O
Rules.Description: Every green must touch another orange.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-G-B
Rules.Description: Every green must touch another blue.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-G-W
Rules.Description: Every green must touch another white.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-G-K
Rules.Description: Every green must touch another black.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-O-B
Rules.Description: Every orange must touch another blue.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-O-W
Rules.Description: Every orange must touch another white.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-O-K
Rules.Description: Every orange must touch another black.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-K-W
Rules.Description: Every black must touch another white.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-K-B
Rules.Description: Every black must touch another blue.

Rules.Name: TOUCH-B-W
Rules.Description: Every blue must touch another white.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-G-O
Rules.Description: Every green must not touch another orange.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-G-B
Rules.Description: Every green must not touch another blue.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-G-W
Rules.Description: Every green must not touch another white.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-G-K
Rules.Description: Every green must not touch another black.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-O-B
Rules.Description: Every orange must not touch another blue.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-O-W
Rules.Description: Every orange must not touch another white.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-O-K
Rules.Description: Every orange must not touch another black.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-K-W
Rules.Description: Every black must not touch another white.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-K-B
Rules.Description: Every black must not touch another blue.

Rules.Name: NOTOUCH-B-W
Rules.Description: Every blue must not touch another white.

Rules.Name: RATIO4-G-O
Rules.Description: The sum of green to orange must be exactly 4.

Rules.Name: RATIO4-G-B
Rules.Description: The sum of green to blue must be exactly 4.

Rules.Name: RATIO4-G-W
Rules.Description: The sum of green to white must be exactly 4.

Rules.Name: RATIO4-G-K
Rules.Description: The sum of green to black must be exactly 4.

Rules.Name: RATIO4-O-B
Rules.Description: The sum of orange to blue must be exactly 4.

Rules.Name: RATIO4-O-W
Rules.Description: The sum of orange to white must be exactly 4.

Rules.Name: RATIO4-O-K
Rules.Description: The sum of orange to black must be exactly 4.

Rules.Name: RATIO4-K-W
Rules.Description: The sum of black to white must be exactly 4.

Rules.Name: RATIO4-K-B
Rules.Description: The sum of black to blue must be exactly 4.

Rules.Name: RATIO4-B-W
Rules.Description: The sum of blue to white must be exactly 4.

Rules.Name: GT-G-O
Rules.Description: The count of green must be greater than orange.

Rules.Name: GT-G-B
Rules.Description: The count of green must be greater than blue.

Rules.Name: GT-G-W
Rules.Description: The count of green must be greater than white.

Rules.Name: GT-G-K
Rules.Description: The count of green must be greater than black.

Rules.Name: GT-O-B
Rules.Description: The count of orange must be greater than blue.

Rules.Name: GT-O-W
Rules.Description: The count of orange must be greater than white.

Rules.Name: GT-O-K
Rules.Description: The count of orange must be greater than black.

Rules.Name: GT-K-W
Rules.Description: The count of black must be greater than white.

Rules.Name: GT-K-B
Rules.Description: The count of black must be greater than blue.

Rules.Name: GT-B-W
Rules.Description: The count of blue must be greater than white.
